page.title: 20TRANSPORT KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content: {Bus service}to Grewelthorpe & Kirkby Malzeard cut drastically in recent years - runs only Thurs.(Market Day in Ripon) and Sats.{Private hire service available in Kirkby Malzeard.{Car hire service organised by North Yorks. County Council Mons.Tues.Wed.and Fri. booked in advance for journeys to & from Ripon. Fixed fare scale - passengers picked up at home. Local proprietor has mini and 30 seater bus for hire. School children (over 11yrs) transported by special{coaches}to Ripon secondary schools & Harrogate. Difficulties arise for school leavers and students travelling to Further Ed. Colleges,etc. Majority commute to nearest towns for employment.{Car}a necessity. 85% own cars in Grewelthorpe and 77% in Kirkby Malzeard.
